metadata.description: You're Colossus, the steel-skinned X-Man who can dish out some serious hurt. So when Wolverine wants to take you down a peg or two, who's he gonna call? If you're thinking mean and green, you're on the right track...! Join X-Legend Chris Claremont for a tutorial in pain you won't forget! Plus: a classic Claremont tale!
metadata.name: X-Men vs. Hulk
